params.question:
6. To make a bulleted list of items, you first select the text. Then you click on the bullet list icon on the toolbar, after which you select the Bullet List. The selected text will then be arranged as a list of bullets.

Are the given steps true for creating a bullet list?

questions: We can insert an image in a document by selecting the *Picture: Refer to the given image for the correct word.* button on the toolbar. After that, we click on the *image/picture/photo* we want to insert. We then click the *Open: Refer to the given image for the correct word.* button to insert the image.

params.taskDescription: 8. What are the combinations of buttons in the keyboard to use to do the following in WordPad? (Try it out yourself!)
params.resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
params.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
params.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
params.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
params.textField:
Firstly, select the text you want to modify. You can then copy the selected text using *Ctrl+C\+Correct! \-Incorrect!* buttons on the keyboard. 

Then put your cursor somewhere you want to place the copied text to then press *Ctrl+V\+Correct! \-Incorrect!* on the keyboard to paste the text.

questions:
a. Click on the *Find* icon in the toolbar.

b. The Find dialog *box/window* will be displayed.

c. Type the *word/letter/text* you want to find in the Find What box.

d. Click on the *Find Next* button to find the next matching word.

e. After finding all the matching words, click the *OK* box.

overallFeedback.feedback: Excellent ! Keep up the good performance.
